# STAT2170/6180 Assignment, 2021 S1

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

<!-- The goal of this repo is to provide a template and folder structure for submitting your assignment via `Github`. You have to create a Markdown file in the directory and push to your repo. How well you utilise `Github` as part of your workflow will form part of the assessment.  -->

The answers included in pdf file deeply explain the questions for the two study: survival time of patients that have a particular type of liver operation as part of their treatment and fuel efficiency of a new car engine. 

Rmarkdown file could be transform to pdf file.

Both Rmarkdown and pdf file are updated to `Github` using commit and push.
